name: Chimeric Rat
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Chimeric Creation: The rat has gills, iridescent scales, and the ability to breathe air and water.
traits.Keen Smell: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +0+1d4 - 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.
